enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: This contact group was co-chaired by Audun Rosland (Norway) and William Kojo Agyemang-Bonsu (Ghana).
Co-Chair Rosland recalled progress achieved on the common reporting format at SBSTA-20.
Delegates heard presentations from Canada and Sweden on reporting systems for the Protocol and engaged in a question-and- answer session.
The Secretariat reported on issues related to LULUCF under Protocol Article 6 (joint implementation).

Co-Chair Rosland, supported by the EU, CANADA and JAPAN, proposed removing all brackets in the draft negotiating text forwarded from SBSTA-20 and deleting the option on the common reporting format referring to Article 6.
BRAZIL, for G-77/China, requested time to consider the matter further, but hoped to reach agreement on the issue at COP-10.
AOSIS, opposed by CANADA and NEW ZEALAND, said SBSTA should request the IPCC to revise 'method one' (units of land subject to multiple activities) in the GPG.
